name: Light and Dance VR - Music, Action, Relaxation
description: Step into a world where music is all that matters. Lay down and relax to watch the colors and patterns change to your music, dance or challenge yourself in one of the music driven games. Many amazing environments and dance floors are waiting for you to dance the night away!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista or newer Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 550 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
